content.text:
# Critics' Choice Super Award for Best Actress in a Superhero Movie

(2)
| year = 2021
| website = http://www.criticschoice.com/
}}
The '''Critics' Choice Super Award for Best Actress in a Superhero Movie' is an award presented by the Critics Choice Association to the best performance by an actress in a superhero film.
This award was first presented in 2021 to Margot Robbie for her role as Harley Quinn on Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn). Along with Florence Pugh, they are also the most nominated actresses in this category with two nominations each.
The current recipient of the award is Florence Pugh for her role as Yelena Belova in Thunderbolts*.
